Ref: IRDAI/INT/CIR/MISC/129/6/2023
Date: 14th June, 2023
Subject: Repealing of redundant Circulars/Guidelines/Clarifications etc

Ref: IRDAI/INT/CIR/MISC/129/6/2023
Date: 14th June, 2023
Subject: Repealing of redundant Circulars/Guidelines/Clarifications etc
Ref No: IRDAI/INT/CIR/MISC/129/6/2023 Date: 14th June, 2023 /To , All Insurance Intermediaries and Insurers, Re: Repealing of redundant Circulars/Guidelines/Clarifications etc. 1. To rationalise, streamline the regulatory framework, enhance clarity and reduce complexity in compliance requirements, various redundant circulars / guidelines / clarifications issued by the Authority are repealed. This action is taken in response to the issuance of subsequent regulations, guidelines, updates and lapse of time- specific instructions. The list of circulars / guidelines / clarifications repealed are attached to this circular as Annexure A. 2. This has the approval of the competent authority.
